  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConnectionException
    This exception is thrown when there is attempt to reconnect a player which is already connected, or disconnect a player which has already been disconnected.
    GameStatusException
    Exception thrown if an action is done in the wrong game phase.
    InvalidCardCreationException
    Exception thrown when CardFactory attempts to create an invalid card.
    InvalidChoiceException
    Thrown after an attempt to set a variable to a value that does not belong to the set of allowed choices
    InvalidCoordinatesException
    Represents invalid game coordinates, that is coordinates whose sum is not a multiple of 2, or more generically game coordinates used improperly during the game itself.
    InvalidDrawCardException
    Exception thrown when the player tries to draw a card and the deck is empty
    InvalidPlayCardException
    Exception related to wrong playing of a card by a player.
    InvalidPlayerException
    This exception was the player passed to a method is not valid, either because he doesn't belong to the match or because he isn't allowed to call that method at that moment (i.e.
    InvalidPlayersNumberException
    This exception is thrown when the player number is not valid (ie <2 or >4), or there are different players who have the same token
    ModelException
    Main exception class for the Model package
    PlayerHandException
    This exception is thrown when there is attempt to add a card to the hand of a player who has already three cards (i.e.
    RequirementsNotMetException
    Exception thrown when the player tries to place a card on the field but has not met its requirements
    VariableAlreadySetException
    Exception thrown when a setter of a variable that should only be set one time outside a constructor is called more than once
